human.name: Human
human.backstory_intro: You awaken with a gasp, memories hazy, a sense of urgency pricking at you.

elf.name: Elf
elf.backstory_intro: Sunlight dapples through ancient leaves, stirring you from a deep slumber.

orc.name: Orc
orc.backstory_intro: The clang of distant metal and the smell of smoke rouse you. Your muscles ache.
